page.title: 05A day in my life by Stephen
page.content: When I get up in the morning my brother has usually gone to school.I have my breakfast which is cereal and toast or an egg and I have some orange juice,then I have a wash and clean my teeth and get dressed for school.In the Summer I wear shorts and a tee- shirt and short socks.In winter I wear my school uniform.I have a grey jumper and long grey or black trousers.My school is nearly three miles away from my house because we live right in the country,my mum takes me in the car.The school I go to is Chale C.E.Primary.We begin school at 9.30am and have lessons until 12.15 Then I have a school dinner it costs 60p a day.After dinner we read,do P.E.and sometimes we have art and craft.I leave school at 3.15pm.When I get home I watch T.V. play with my computer or play in the garden.I have my tea.Then I go to bed.
